title: New: Teengirl Fantasy – Motif
content:
So it’s been blogged about pretty much everywhere today, but Motif, this new track from trip-pop duo Teengirl Fantasy kills it.

Gradually unfurling over it’s seven minute length, with broad synth sections and stunning percussion fading in and out, it’s the best non-drug-induced trip you’ll ever have. Motif is released on 25 June via R&S Records, check it out below.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
